<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Virthad](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2295)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />

<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 237

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +18, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dogslicer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=49)_, robes, sack of flytrap pods

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +18 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 135

</row>

**End the Charade <actions string="Reaction" /> ([ <%TRAITS%15%%> attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) <%END>) **Trigger** The doppelganger is transformed with Change Shape and another creature moves adjacent to it or takes a hostile action against it. **Effect** The doppelganger reverts to its natural form and can make a Strike against the triggering creature. If the creature was unaware the doppelganger was in disguise, that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against this attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dogslicer_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 slashing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 23
- **3rd**
[Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will)

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Ghoulish Cravings](/Spells.aspx?ID=134), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292)
- **4th**
[Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The doppelganger takes on the specific appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid who it has seen and whose appearance it remembers. This doesn't change the doppelganger's Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes but might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**Deploy Flytraps** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Requirements** Virthad is carrying a sack of prepared flytrap pods; **Effect** Virthad dumps the contents of the sack into two adjacent squares while invoking prayers to Lamashtu. The pods grow into two elite snapping flytraps that immediately attack any non-worshipper of Lamashtu they can detect.

</column>
